,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_recipe l WHERE r.rcpNo = l.rcpNo AND memNo = ${memNo}) as isLike
,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clip_rcp cr WHERE r.rcpNo = cr.rcpNo AND memNo = ${memNo}) as isClip
FROM recipe r LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT rcpNo FROM like_recipe) As l on (r.rcpNo = l.rcpNo) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT rcpNo FROM review_rcp) As rv on (r.rcpNo = rv.rcpNo) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT rcpNo FROM clip_rcp) As cr on (r.rcpNo = cr.rcpNo)
mapper.select:
WHERE 1 = 1
AND( r.RCP_NM LIKE '%${all}%' OR r.RCP_PARTS_DTLS LIKE '%${all}%' OR r.RCP_PAT2 LIKE '%${all}%' )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLIP_RCP WHERE memNo = #{memNo}
